#Load Libraries
```{r}
library(RANN);library(rattle); library(caret); library(randomForest); library(rpart); library(rpart.plot)
```

#Pull Data
```{r}
trainUrl <- "http://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/predmachlearn/pml-training.csv"
testUrl <- "http://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/predmachlearn/pml-testing.csv"
training <- read.csv(url(trainUrl))
testing <- read.csv(url(testUrl))
```


```{r}
#Explore
head(training)
str(training)
ncol(training)
```

#DATA SLICING
Splitting Training Data into training and testing, on outcome classe
```{r}
inTrain <- createDataPartition(y=training$classe, p = .75, list = FALSE)
training<-training[inTrain,]; testing<-training[-inTrain,]
dim(training); dim(testing)
```
